DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , activity pharmacokinetics new investigational drug ( HQK-1001 ) healthy human volunteer . This study also evaluate difference parameter HQK-1001 administer fed versus fast state .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Placebo Controlled Study Safety , Activity Pharmacokinetics HQK-1001 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female Between age 18 45 year old Able willing give inform consent Able comply study procedure If female , must childbearing potential must agree use one follow form contraception screen throughout study : hormonal ( i.e. , oral , transdermal , implant injection ) ; double barrier ( i.e. , condom , diaphragm spermicide ) ; intrauterine device ( IUD ) ; vasectomize partner ( 6 month minimum ) ; abstinence Male subject must also agree use one form birth control either partner , appropriate , throughout course study Not receive medication within 2 week first dose study medication , except multivitamin contraception Complete blood count ( CBC ) white blood cell ( WBC ) count hemoglobin , hematocrit , reticulocyte count platelet count within normal range test facility clinically significant Serum ferritin level > 50 ng/ml Cohort 1 Serum ferritin level > 30 mg/ml Cohorts 2 , 3 , 4 5 Serum chemistry value , coagulation test urinalysis value within normal range test facility clinically significant Negative urine test substance abuse include marijuana , cocaine , opiates , methadone Prior participation HQP 2007001 Clinically significant abnormal vital sign Blood donation within 2 month study medication administration Blood transfusion within 3 month study medication administration An acute febrile illness upper respiratory tract illness within 72 hour prior administration study medication Received another investigational agent within 4 week administration study medication Receiving investigational agent study Any acute chronic disease ( e.g. , history hepatitis B C HIV1 ) Heart disease include abnormal electrocardiogram , clinical significant , ( ECG ) cardiac arrhythmia History neurological disease , seizure disorder Currently pregnant breast feeding child A smoker past 12 month Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 33 kg/m2
